bwwExcerpt: Director Jeff Calhoun stages the projection-rich production with great efficiency even if it takes awhile to get off the ground. "Bonnie and Clyde" has many virtues but also enough flaws to keep it from blowing you away.

keyPhrases.quote: Bonnie and Clyde has many virtues but also enough flaws to keep it from blowing you away.
